title: Why is Ryze able to start sapphire crystal
body: its so hard to even punish a ryze for starting with it and as soon as he gets a tear he just spams relentlessly. but maybe im just not playing against ryzes properly

replies.body:
? a saphire crystal wouldn't be the reason you're struggling against him early on.

It wouldn't make any real difference if he started ring or crystal, that spam is coming... you just need to play around it somehow

from what i've seen and experienced, the best way to handle a ryze is play someone who pushes the waves just as hard/if not harder than him.

Specific champions? sorry bud i cany give any advice on that, i dont play the lane or go against the champion enough to give any specific hard counters
As Ryze, I struggled against Cassiopeia because she has a better wave clear and poke. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
